main event: A large, glowing, disc-shaped object was observed hovering over the RCA Victor plant in Camden, New Jersey on July 3, 1950.
interesting points: The object was approximately 100 feet in diameter and emitted a bluish-green glow.,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes before the object accelerated and disappeared.,There were no human faces visible in any related images.,The investigation report is classified as UNIDENTIFIED due to limited information., This report is part of the Special Investigation Report - Project Blue Book.
witness description: No other details or witnesses could be obtained.
